CHEMISTRY Multiple Choice 
 The conversion of solid 
 Ca S O 4 into solid Ca O 
 and S O 2 gas 
 is an example of what class of chemical reaction: 
 W) decomposition 
 X) hydrolysis 
 Y) combustion 
 Z) single replacement

 What is the oxidation number of chromium in the chromate ion, or 
 Cr O 4 
 2 negative charge
